name: Hyperplane{0}
description:
Magic filled Metroid style platformer, different abilities have different uses 
If you love 2D and love controlling the elements, we have the perfect game for you. Utilize your elemental powers to navigate a magical world and fight your way through hundreds of enemies in this fantasy Metroid-esque platformer of Hyperplane{0}.

Movement - A W D
Restart - R 
Glide - S
Ground Pound - T
Wind Slash - 1
Shocking - 2
Fireball - 3
Jet Stream - 4
Rock Throw - E
